character.name: Andrés

appearance.hair: short dark brown hair, slightly receding hairline
appearance.distinguishing_features: hardworking appearance, friendly neighborhood shopkeeper look

character.occupation: Owner of neighborhood tienda (small grocery/convenience store) in Laureles, Medellín
character.living_situation: Apartment above tienda with wife Lucía and son Mateo (12)
character.transportation: Walking (store is downstairs), occasional rental van for wholesale runs

style.daily: Casual practical - polo shirts, jeans, comfortable shoes
style.church: Nice button-down shirt and dress pants

background.family: Married to Lucía, son Mateo (12), extended family in Medellín
background.business: Inherited tienda from father, running it for 15+ years
background.community: Known by everyone in the neighborhood, pillar of community

notes.educational_context: This character represents a Colombian tienda owner, a common and respected profession in Colombian neighborhoods. Shows small business operation, family involvement, and community connections.

notes.pedagogical_goal: Help learners see diverse representation while learning vocabulary through a relatable small business owner's daily activities including store operation, Colombian products, family life, and community interaction
